name: Inductive Coupling Mode
description:
There's a time to listen, and there's a time for everyone else to talk to the hand.

Inductive Coupling Mode is a short, spooky visual novel.

Play as Juniper Paul, a little girl adjusting to a recent move and navigating through school with a trusty pair of hearing aids. On a day when she's faced with the burden of going home alone, her hearing aids happen to start picking up on some creepy messages...

This game features:

  • 5 different endings
  • Short playtime
  • Original artwork
  • Original music

This game was developed for the ScreamSonic Jam! Please note that while it likely won't be expanded in the future, it may receive updates for aesthetic and bug fixes.

All sound effects were licensed from WeLoveIndies.com
